channel.title: Bang Tech 12's "Drive Time"
channel.description:
Welcome to the Bang Tech 12 Podcast. Here you will only find EXCLUSIVE mixes from our diverse collection of Musicians.
Tune in every week to get a brand new 45 minute Mix from one of our artists that span Six States, Five Countries and Two Continents.
Each mix is only 45 minutes long to give you the perfect "Drive Time" mix for you to listen to as you do your commute to and from work.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mixes and Original Music from Bang Tech 12 DJ's
channel.itunes:author: BT12
channel.itunes:summary:
Welcome to the Bang Tech 12 Podcast. Here you will only find EXCLUSIVE mixes from our diverse collection of Musicians.
Tune in every week to get a brand new 45 minute Mix from one of our artists that span Six States, Five Countries and Two Continents.
Each mix is only 45 minutes long to give you the perfect "Drive Time" mix for you to listen to as you do your commute to and from work.

item.title: DRIVETIME Episode 49: Todd Perrine
item.description: Episode 49 brings us the DRIVETIME debut of Todd Perrine. It is fitting that this podcast goes up the day before Bang Tech 12's 16th anniversary event. Todd has been a DJ for over 28 years and has seen the evolution of house music first hand. He's been there, done that and continuously looks towards the future. Deep, techy, housey - this mix celebrates the culture rather nicely. Look for a tag team set with N. Mattimoe at 10pm on the main floor of the anniversary party - I hear it's going to be all vinyl and chock full of house classics. Don't miss it. Facebook event page with full lineup and schedule: https://www.facebook.com/events/306533042750148/ Cortiz - Plan B Humandrone Deep Sea & The House Skyrats - Ode (To What) Stephen Rigmaiden - In the Drums (Auto Deeps Auto Drums Remix) Lee Webster - Now Be (Dub mix) Highland Brothers Inc. - This One's a Keeper Higinio - The Message Bicycle Corporation - Blkn (Kivi & Kava Remix) Frederik Stark - Let Down Jazz N Groove - Open Up

item.title: DRIVETIME Episode 48: Ben Wu
item.description: This weeks episode comes from none other than Detroit expat and now Amsterdam resident (with a handful of cities in between), Ben Wu. This set comes out of the gates with some rather sinister tech-house and doesn't quit. Ben is known for his seamless mixing and straight to the point track selection. What you have before you is no exception. Agnes / Ripperton - ZEITGEIST - Tool Edit Nicolas Masseyeff - Mugen Maetrik - The Entity &ME - One Day Tom Clark / Todd Bodine - Don't Lose The Heat Matador - Korrado Timo Maas / Brian Molko - College 84 (&ME Remix) Detachments - Holiday Romance (Florian Meindl Remix) Hyetal - Diamond Islands - Boddika Remix Azari & III - Reckless (Tiga's What Iz Houze Muzik? Remix)

item.title: Drivetime Episode 47: N. Mattimoe - Spring Rinse
item.description: A slick little deep house mix from N. Mattimoe of Bang Tech 12 Ohio, featuring tracks from Rebirth, Cadenza, Get Physical and more. "I wanted to make a mix of promos and purchased tracks that I haven't played out a whole lot - some oldish stuff and some newer, including a brand new track by myself and Todd Perrine." 1.Mattimoe | Perrine - Cruisin' - Unreleased 2.Julian Sanza - Disco Groove - Rebirth 3.Ellroy - Lets Have a Walk - Bedroom Records 4.Silver Team - Potatoes Deluxe - Rebirth 5.Daze Deten - Cosmic Lips - Rebirth 6.Cream Sound - White - Festival Lounge Records 7.Pele and Findling - Deep Sea - Lihab Rmx - Get Physical 8.Robytek vs. Shield - Rendez Vous - Cadenza 9.Kevin Yost - View Vision - I Records Classic 10.The Timewriter - Revealing the Sound - Milton Jackson's Dark Energy Rmx - Streetlight 11.Rob Pearson vs. Csoul feat. Robert Owens - Escape From the Madness - Inland Knights Rmx. - Plastic City 12.Jeremy Blake - Snake Eyes - More or Less Bang Tech 12's 16th Anniversary party is coming up on May 25th - the Friday before Movement fest in Detroit. Follow the Facebook page for developing information. We look forward to a fantastic Summer! https://www.facebook.com/events/306533042750148/

item.title: Drivetime Episode 46: DJ Sneaky
item.description: Happy Spring to all friends and family of Bangtech 12. Drivetime 46 brings us a deep and techy mix by DJ and producer Sneaky aka Joe Christopher, representing Bang Tech 12 in the Chicago area. Sneaky has been very busy in the studio and behind the decks in the last couple years - check out his Soundcloud page here: http://soundcloud.com/joechris Track list: 1. Will Saul, Tam Cooper - Getting Closer (Original Mix) 2. Thugfucker, Tale Of Us, Life And Death - Morgana (Original Mix) 3. Ross Evana - These Sounds (Original Mix) 4. Layo & Bushwacka - Slow Burn - (Original Mix, Exclusive Track) 5. Eddie Amador - House Music - (Moog Remix) 7. Oliver Klein, Kolombo - I Know (Original Mix) 8. Pavel Petrov - Koral (Metodi Hristov Remix) 9. Pig & Dan - Let Me Be Myself - (Original Mix) 10. Anil Chawla - Beso (Original Mix)
item.dc:creator: BT12

item.title: Drivetime Episode 45: DJ ZIX - From Holland to Detroit
item.description: ZIX is the Dutch representative of the Bang Tech 12 crew. His sets are known for their high energy level and amazing record selection. In 2011 he made his first Detroit appearance at the Bang Tech 12 pre Movement party @ Bookies. After that he joined the infamous Bang Tech 12 roster. In May 2012 he will be back in Detroit - make sure to come check him out at the Bang Tech 12 party or one of his other gigs. For all Detroit based promoters, ZIX still has open dates for gigs on May 26-27 and 28th. Contact: ziggyzix@gmail.com for more info. Track list: Kevin Gorman - Alarm (tool re-edit) Psyk - Repeat Raiz & Truncate - Inertia Kevin Gorman - Cyclic (Peter van Hoesen remix) Truncate - Concentrate Alan Fitzpatrick - Prometheus Steve Parker - Anel (Tony Rohrs Caveman mix) Steve Parker - Midnight Express Oscar Mulero - 46 (re-work mix) Truncate - Truncate 18 Steve Parker - Bodytrade

item.title: Drivetime Episode 44: Taylor Norris
item.description: Episode 44 brings us a techno mix by Taylor Norris. Taylor has been hustlin' hard in the Indianapolis and Chicago scene with some great forthcoming releases and bookings. Look for him on the decks Friday, January 27th in the Side Room at Talbott Street (2145 N. Talbott Street, Indianapolis) with BT12 family, Sneeaky from Chicago and hosts DJ Deane and Jackola. 01. Ochu Laross - Dead Ghost 02. Mike Wall - Total Black (Patrick Bateman Remix) 03. Heron - Rufus (Troy Pierce & Heartthrob Square One Recovery Mix) 04. Dan Curtain - System Ara 05. Adam Jay & Taylor Norris - Enso 06. Maksim Dark - Matter 07. Clone Kent - Rindfleisch 08. Black like Milk - Dark Room Monster (Splatter Remix) 09. Darksome Notes - Impulse Traffic 10. Felix Lorusso, Kamika, Manege - Backwards 11. Oliver Huntemann - Delirium 12. Oliver Huntemann - Rotten

item.title: Drivetime Episode 43: G Major
item.description: Happy New Year to all our Bang Tech 12 family, friends and followers! After a short hiatus we are back with a funky banger of a house mix from G Major. Mr. Major was pretty busy behind the decks and in the studio last year and this year looks to be no different. Check out his 'Bustin Loose' EP out now on Traxsource: http://www.traxsource.com/index.php?act=show&fc=tpage&cr=titles&cv=119658 Enjoy! 1. Selda - Lift Your Hands Up (Dj pp remix) 2. Joey Negro - Must Be the Music (Crazibiza Remix) 3. Lohn Jacobsen / G Martinez - It's Hot (Dexexl Lamanuel Tanga Remix) 4. Format B - Oversexed 5. Reza - Bakongo (Manuel la Mare Remix) 6. Mr. Boom - Never Stop 7. Gene Farris - The Return of Disco (Gramophonedize Remix) 8. Erick Morillo, Harry Romero, Jose Nunez feat. Shawnee Taylor - Gravy

item.title: Drivetime Episode 42: Robert Lowell "Be Some Body"
item.description: Episode 42 Comes our way from Robert Lowell. It was so good I left it at 60 minutes. "The music dives into deep melodic rhythms, chugging basslines and all out Detroit dirtyness. Blurring some of the finest elements of techno and house this mix will get your engine going. You will be in for a treat with this new 60 minute podcast. Enjoy." 01. MacKee :. Blood And Soul : Dirtydrivesounds 02. Oliver Klein, Peter Juergens :. Hey Baby (Chris Lattner Remix) : Kling Klong 03. Nick Verwey :. Heavy Ds Joint : Jump To This 04. Tiger Stripes :. Square One : SOUNDZ 05. Cross Groove :. Lions Tigers Bears : Erase Records 06. Roman Rai :. Kumamba : Tokyo Red Recordings 07. Tapesh :. Movin (Skai & Joel Armstrong Frankouver Remix) : Alive Recordings 08. Deep Dusk :. House Galaxy : My Little Dog 09. DJ T :. Leaving Me feat Khan (Clockwork CW Remix) : Get Physical 10. Big Al :. Mucho Gusto (Bescheerer Mix) : Dutchie Worldwide 11. Alexander Fog, Alberto Drago :. Green Room (Miguel Katas & Andrew 500 Remix) : Darkstar 12. Alexander Sting :. Gruen : Klangkorpus 13. Jahiro Alfaro :. Dream With Me : Epoque Music 14. PigCity :. Only Idiots Fall In Love : Keep On

item.title: Drivetime Episode 41 - DJ Zix
item.description: Well, it's been a while, but we are back. Episode 41 brings us a killer techno mix from DJ Zix out of the Netherlands... "This set is something different from what I would normally play during my peak-time sets. It starts off with a dark sinister sound, but at the end of the set there is a melodic part to it. So this could be a good cooling down set after coming back from a party, preferably a party where you just heard a Bang Tech 12 dj play, of course. I had a great time recording this set for all you Bang Tech 12 followers. I hope to see you all soon at a party near you. Take care and enjoy the set. Greetz from the Netherlands" - DJ Zix Set List: Psych - Crypt Shifted - Control Function vs Jerome Sydenham - Two ninety one Jerome Sydenham - The Visitation R-Play - Taper Simon Baker - Spinner (Sian rmx) Phil Kieran - Le Carrousel (Egbert rmx) Android Cartel - Robotic Redemption Samuel L Session - Inner City Dust 5 Psycatron - People in glass houses
item.dc:creator: BT12

item.title: Drivetime Episode 40 - G Major
item.description: Episode 40 brings us a banging house set from DJ and producer, G Major. Check out his "Stealth" EP on Moehouse records: http://www.traxsource.com/index.php?act=show&fc=tpage&cr=titles&cv=75114 1. Promise Land - Umek 2. The Groovy Stuff - Jay Lumen 3. Fucking House Music - Stefano Neferini 4. District (Modual/Mike Newman - Adoo 5. Renegade - Inaki Santos 6. Knick Knack - John Rundell 7. In Between (Supernova) - Nice7 8. Acid Wonder - Jonny Fiasco

item.title: Drivetime Episode 39 - Aaron Litschke - Techno
item.description: Episode 39 brings us a hot little techno mix by Aaron Litschke out of Minneapolis. 1. Outage - Original Mix - Andrea Giuliani, Luca Rossetti- Malatoid Select 2 2. Goblet - Original Mix -Wave Form WR - Showcase Vol.4 3. Cold Room - Frenkie V Remix - Frankyeffe, Atochi Cold Room EP 4. Babou - Original Mix - Julian Jeweil - Babou 5. Meltin Pot - Original Mix - Mark Broom - Meltin Pot EP 6. Hell - Dustin Zahn's Lived There Remix - Monque, Monotek Hell EP 7. Hot Knives - Original Mix - Slam - Hot Knives 8. Amore - Original Mix - Julian Jeweil - Color 9. W 26th Street - Aaron Litschke, Dj Seoul-Alien Force 10. Juggernaut - Original Mix - Jamie Anderson, Deepgroove 11. I've Fallen - Original Mix - Audio Injection - Exit Strategy Droid 10

item.title: Drivetime Episode 38 - DJ Moreese - Payin it Back
item.description: Number 38 brings yet another funky banger of a set by DJ Moreese. What the hell? 5 tracks in 45 minutes? Yeah, well that's because he juggles and mixes the hell out of these tracks. Killer turntable skills right here y'all. Check it out: 1. Giano ~ The Big Pay Back 2. Circus ~ With Patron 3. Funky Bus Fair ~ Patron 4. Thrill Halloween Mix ~ Giano 5. Get Back ~ main Mix ~ Mr. V
item.dc:creator: BT12
item.itunes:summary:

1. Giano ~ The Big Pay Back
2. Circus ~ With Patron
3. Funky Bus Fair ~ Patron
4. Thrill Halloween Mix ~ Giano
5. Get Back ~ main Mix ~ Mr. V

item.title: Drivetime Episode 37 - Dilemma - Summer Drum and Bass Mix
item.description: Episode 37 brings us another tight little Drum and Bass set from Dilemma. 15 tracks in 49 minutes - Perfect for that chill out session by the pool or while flipping burgers on the BBQ. 1) Beautiful - Brooks Brothers feat Robert Owens 2) Sway - Drifta & Dean Case 3) Its Our Love - Syncopix feat Sean 4) Forbiden Kingdom - The Noble Six (twothirds rmx) 5) Poon - Subzero 6) Goin In Heavy - Dubversion 7) Regurgitate - Nosia 8) Society - Deviant Nature 9) Lithium - Mister Fever 10) The Way I Feel - Borderline 11) Cali Bass - Dubversion 12) Santa Cruz - Blockhe4d & Cabbie 13) The Weakness - Subzero & Jaydan 14) Food Fight - Dj Hazard 15) Yuor Way - Netsky

item.title: Drivetime Episode 35 - DJ Seoul - A Long Drive on a Short Road: Driving on Acid
item.description: A brand new mix of acid house classics from DJ Seoul... "For my first submission to the drivetime podcast, I put together most of my favorite acid house songs. These songs take me back to the very beginning of my life revolving around electronic music and all have special meaning for me. Not only are these songs timeless, but they are also some of the best sing along songs ever. If I could just find a place that had karaoke for this list of classics, I would be there all the time..." Tracklist 1. Acid Thunder - Fast Eddie (Rocky Jones Mix) - DJ International Records 2. Dadajack - Mike Ink - Kreisel 15 3. Funkgasim - DJ Funk - International House Records 4. Lack of Love - Charles B Club Mix) - Desire 5. Peaking China - The Cranky Scientist - Definitive Recordings 6. Phreak - DBX - Accelerate 7. Time for Jack - Fatjack - Addicted 8. No Way Back - Adonis - Trax Records 9. Confusion - Armando - Pisces Music 10. Playtex - Mike Ink - Kreisel 45 11. The Creator - Phuture - Indigo Records 12. Acid Thunder - Fast Eddie (Fast Eddie Mix) - DJ International Records 13. Personal Problem - Mike Dunn - Underground 14. 151 - Armando - Warehouse Records 15. DJ Pierre - Box Energy - Trax Records 16. This is Acid - Maurice (Deep Dub Mix) - Vendetta Records

item.title: Drivetime Episode 34 - N. Mattimoe - Anywhere But Here
item.description: This weeks podcast features another journey through the varied styles of house music presented by producer and Dj N. Mattimoe from Bang Tech 12 Ohio. With tracks from Japan, Detroit, Toledo, Italy, Germany and more, this mix takes you on an aural vacation you may never want to return from... 1. Kuniyuki - Precious Hall - Resources 2. Norm Talley - Change - Mike Huckaby rmx - Third Ear 3. N. Mattimoe - Delited - Mo Reese rmx - Mohouse 4. V. Rotz - Smokey Wanda - Nordik Net LTD 5. Delano Smith - 123 - Kolour Recordings Digital 6. Hooved - Somnambulism - Safari Electronique 7. Scott - What You Got - The Gym Germany 8. SoulPhiction - Some Things Remain - Philpot 9. Lo Fi Society - Red - Planet East 10. Rennie Foster feat. Moka Only - Connect like Four (Samuel L. Session rmx) - Rebirth 11. Tuccilo - Invisible - Rebirth 12. Bucher and Kessidis - Low Pressure - Plastic City 13. Gorge and Andre Hommen - Hakunyo (Ray Okapara rmx) - PLastic City

item.title: Drivetime Episode 33 - Dilemma - Road Rage
item.description: A Drum and Bass onslaught from from Florida native and Breakloose / Bang Tech 12 heavyweight, Dilemma. "I put this mix together to give you all a little something to bang your head to while stuck in traffic. I cannot be responsible if it causes any road rage so listen at your own risk!!!" -Dilemma 1 - Boogie Droid - Dextems 2 - Closer - Tribal Underground 3 - Detected - Bowser 4 - The Burning Shadow - Aeph (prolix rmx) 5 - The Heat - Concord Dawn & Rido 6 - Crowd Surfer - Cooh & Counterstrike 7 - Come With It - Dub Zer0 8 - Uppi - Int Company 9 - Aurora Borealis - Neutral Point 10 - Excessive Use - Fourward 11 - Contrair - Neonlight 12 - Paranoia - Masheen & Kano

item.title: "Drivetime" Episode 32 - Taylor Norris
item.description: Indianapolis veteran, Taylor Norris is in the mix this week. With over a decade of experience Taylor is completely comfortable working the dancefloor and making people move. This collection of funky, club minded tech-house has been masterfully blended in order to set the tone for an epic night on the town. 01. Appleblim, Ramadanman - Void 23 02. Pig & Dan - Lets Go 03. Mark Broom, Dustin Zahn - Leave Me Alone (Drumcell Remix) 04. Beckers, D-Nox - Call Me (Enrico Sangiuliano Remix) 05. Magitman, Flippers - 6 Under 06. Matteo Scaioli - To The Moon (Alex D'elia & Hinil Young Drumming on the Moon) 07. Fergie - Slazenger (D-Nox & Beckers Remix) 08. Hanneman - Blood & Alcohol 09. Voltaxx, Lissat, Manuel De La Mare - Club Around The World (Anil Chawla Remix) 10. Alex Dolby - Urban Gate 11. D-Nox, Gabe - Little Patie

item.title: "Drivetime" Episode 31 - 8en - "The Reason I'm Here"
item.description: Episode 31 features one of our O.G. members; 8en. He runs a very successful podcast himself, so we wanted him to do something special for this one. It's called "The Reason I'm Here" and is a collection of tunes that made me him the DJ he is today. From early rave to early Detroit "Hardcore" to Hardcore, these are some of his favorite tunes ever. They basically cover just the years 1991 to 1992, when he started going to parties and really getting into the scene.   Tracklisting: 1. Mental Collapse--Wholesome Pills 2. Outlander--Vamp 3. Praga Khan--Free Your Body (Injected With A Poison) 4. NJoi--Malfunction 5. Carl Cox--Let The Bass Kick 6. NJoi--Techno Gangsters 7. Rich Lee--Rock So Hard 8. Fade 2 Black--In Sync 9. Joey Beltram--My Sound 10. The Hypnotist--The House Is Mine 11. Glide--All Right (Classic Mix) 12. John & Julie--Double Happiness (Fantasia Mix) 13. GTO--Elevation 14. Knight Phantom--Kick Up The Volume (Play It Loud) 15. Interface--Mix A2 16. Interface--Mix B1 17. Kid Unknown--Devastating Beat Creator (Fierce Mix) 18. Holy Noise--Get Down Everybody 19. Altern8--Infiltrate 202 (Astrix & Space RMX) 20. E-Dancer--Pump The Move 21. Smart Systems--The Creator 22. Missing Channel--Rave 2 The Maximum 23. H-Bomb--Radar 24. X-101--Sonic Destroyer 25. Underground Resistance--Punisher 26. Sonic Experience--MTS (Murder Those Speakers) 27. Sonic Experience--Protein (Hardcore Innovator) 28. The Hypnotist--Hardcore,You Know The Score

item.title: "Drivetime" Episode 30 - N-ter
item.description: Our 30th episode comes all the way from Croatia. Hailing from Zagreb, Croatia is the world's leading force in Electro. Born in 1981 in a small town named Osijek, Bojan Jascur aka N-ter has been producing hit after hit since 1999 and is a true Electro Activist. His debut release "Egoboo Bits" was the first record of its type to come out of Croatia and led to the creation of the Crobot Crew. Originally formed with his partner DJ Xed, the Crobot Crew and Crobot Muzik were founded by N-ter to promote the Electro and Ghettotech sounds throughout Eastern Europe. Crobot Muzik found immediate success through their critically acclaimed releases and garnered the attention of the Heavyweights in the industry who continuously play and chart their music. Since then, N-ter has released his original music on some of the world's leading record labels. From his A.U.X. 88 remixes on Puzzlebox Records to his original selections on Twilight 76, Databass, Diggarama, Sonic Walker, Drivecom and Subsonic Device, N-ter's production work is in high demand. He has done remixes for A.U.X.88, DJ Godfather, Exzact, Paul Blackford and the Autonomous Bassheads to name a few. His latest release "This is my Life" is one of the feature tracks on the world renown Street Sounds Record label out of the UK and has been topping the Electro Charts as the number one Electro song on the airwaves. As a DJ, Bojan's skills on the turntables are unmatched and have risen him to international status. Since 2003, N-ter has had toured Europe and Asia continuously while still finding time to Headline major Events in Detroit and Miami as both a DJ and as a Live Act performing his distinct sound on stage for all to see. To expand on future projects, N-ter has created the Electro duoTellefunk as well as starting the new record label Elecrtrobass. These 2 projects give him an even larger ability to focus on Electro music and his mission of spreading Electro to all four corners of the planet. 1.NETZWERK EUROPA - NETZWERK EUROPA 2.AURAL FLOAT - FINAL FRONTIERS 3.ANTHONY ROTHER - TRANS EUROPE EXPRESS B MIX 4.ANTHONY ROTHER - TRANS EUROPE EXPRESS MAIN MIX 5.BORIS DIVIDER - PEOPLE LOVE MACHINES 6.NETZWERK FLORIDA - EARTH WIND FIRE 7.OXIA - SOURCE 8.PHIL KIERAN - STRINGS ON THE HILL 9.MYSTIC LETTER K - DUST 10.INDUSTRIAL BASS MACHINE - DEVASTATE THE PLANET 11.INFINITI AND J-BREAK - SCIENCE FICTION (INFINITI REMIX) 12.JACKAL AND HYDE - THIS IS THE SOUND OF UNDERGROUND 13.ZETA RETICULA - A1 EP2

Born in 1981 in a small town named Osijek, Bojan Jascur aka N-ter has been producing hit after hit since 1999 and is a true Electro Activist. Originally formed with his partner DJ Xed, the Crobot Crew and Crobot Muzik were founded by N-ter to promote the Electro and Ghettotech sounds throughout Eastern Europe.
Crobot Muzik found immediate success through their critically acclaimed releases and garnered the attention of the Heavyweights in the industry who continuously play and chart their music. From his A.U.X. 88 remixes on Puzzlebox Records to his original selections on Twilight 76, Databass, Diggarama, Sonic Walker, Drivecom and Subsonic Device, N-ter's production work is in high demand. He has done remixes for A.U.X.88, DJ Godfather, Exzact, Paul Blackford and the Autonomous Bassheads to name a few. His latest release "This is my Life" is one of the feature tracks on the world renown Street Sounds Record label out of the UK and has been topping the Electro Charts as the number one Electro song on the airwaves.
As a DJ, Bojan's skills on the turntables are unmatched and have risen him to international status. Since 2003, N-ter has had toured Europe and Asia continuously while still finding time to Headline major Events in Detroit and Miami as both a DJ and as a Live Act performing his distinct sound on stage for all to see. To expand on future projects, N-ter has created the Electro duoTellefunk as well as starting the new record label Elecrtrobass. 1.NETZWERK EUROPA - NETZWERK EUROPA 2.AURAL FLOAT - FINAL FRONTIERS 3.ANTHONY ROTHER - TRANS EUROPE EXPRESS B MIX 4.ANTHONY ROTHER - TRANS EUROPE EXPRESS MAIN MIX 5.BORIS DIVIDER - PEOPLE LOVE MACHINES 6.NETZWERK FLORIDA - EARTH WIND FIRE 7.OXIA - SOURCE 8.PHIL KIERAN - STRINGS ON THE HILL 9.MYSTIC LETTER K - DUST 10.INDUSTRIAL BASS MACHINE - DEVASTATE THE PLANET 11.INFINITI AND J-BREAK - SCIENCE FICTION (INFINITI REMIX) 12.JACKAL AND HYDE - THIS IS THE SOUND OF UNDERGROUND 13.ZETA RETICULA - A1 EP2

item.title: Episode 24 - Nimbus - Breakout 3
item.description: Our newest episode comes from Nimbus. His latest mix features 3 new original tracks from himself as well as several exclusive tunes from some of the most promising up and coming artists from across the U.S. He definitely keeps the vibes pushing, as usual, with a synergy of energetic tracks and a constant progression of bass. Nimbus always keeps the energy level up and this one is sure to make your drive time a lot more fun. 1. Heapy & Doctor - corrupted meditation ( Nimbus' salvation mix) 2. Dj Fixx and Nimbus feat. Teddy MC - big shot 3.Nimbus and Curtis B feat. Alaska - We doin it 4. Deadmau5 - sofi needs a latter (William Van Dyke remix) 5. Aaren San - Apes from space (Dirty Loud vs ReFaze edit) 6. Kanye West - Runaway (Rel1 Re-rub) 7. Bombs Away - Ghetto bitches (Dirty Loud remix) sychosis edit 8. Deadmau5 - a city in Florida 9. Sychosis - Blast off edit 10. Rel1 - WTFIH re-rub 11. Rel1 - On my own re-dub 12. Plan B - love goes down (Doctor P remix) (Nimbus & Mr.Sinder edit)

item.title: Episode 23 - DJ Mo Reese - All Tracks
item.description: Episode 23 is a deep, jackin house mix from Mo Reese. Originally from Detroit, the CEO of Moehouse Records has been holding down the Cincinnati scene for quite some time now. One of Bang Tech 12's most seasoned veterans, listen to see why DJ Mo Reese has been in demand internationally for over 20 years. 1. DJ Mo Reese ~ Shallow Ground ~ MoeHouse Records ~ Deep House 2. Lem Springsteen ~ New Beginning ~ Restless Soul ~ Soulful House 3.DJ Sneak ~ Crazy in The Ghetto ~ GuestHouse Records ~ House 4.Maurice Joahua ~ More Love ~ Digital Records 5. Harry Choo Choo Remero ~ La Luz ~ BamBa Records 6. Mr. V ~Hard Drive Deep Inside ~ Strictly Rhythm 7. DJ Mo Reese ~ Funk DA Worm ~ MoeHouse Records ~ Jackin House
